name: Thescent
description:
Thescent is an OpenGL implementation of the original Descent (1995) by Interplay Entertainment. This is a 3D, sci-fi FPS that puts the player in control of a spaceship trapped inside a space station overrun by rampant robots.

In Thescent, your mission is to rescue the sole survivor and destroy the reactor core so you can travel safely back home.

We're counting on you captain!

--
